about.about:
Hi! My name is Emirhan, I am a Full-Stack Developer and UI Designer.
I live in Turkey.

quotes: All of my hope is in the youth.
The rising new generation, the future is yours. We have established the Republic, you will raise and maintain Him.
Everyone should know their national duties and responsibility, with that thought, thinking and working on the issues of the country.
Work by hand for the nation you are connected, not for yourself. This is the highest of the studies.
O Turkish youth! The first duty is to defend the Turkish Independence, the Turkish Republic, forever, preservation and defense.

Today, the common task of all of us; To protect the national values, consciousness, the Republic, to protect the spirit that won the War of Independence, and to convey this consciousness to future generations. The Turkish nation will walk strongly to the bright future with its language, culture, historical and respectable identity.

You, the young sons of the new Turkey! Even if you get tired, you will follow me ... Those who decide to walk not to rest, never and never get tired. Turkish youth will walk to the goal, our high ideal without stopping and getting tired.
Teachers! The Republic requires you with its thoughts free, free conscience, and free generations.
... This nation and the country will not end the duty of service.
The Turkish nation has established a new state with a new faith and a definite national determination.
We don't need anything, we need something alone; to be hardworking!
We have done a big revolution. We took the country from a age to a new age.
Those who have understood the purpose of the revolution will constantly have the power to protect it.
How happy is the one who says I am a Turk!

Teachers! The new generation, the devoted teachers and educators of the Republic, you will train, the new generation will be your work. The value of the work will be considered with its degree of dexterity and sacrifice.
The victory won by our armies has prepared the ground for the victory of you and your armies ... You will win the real victory and you will continue and you will surely succeed.
As the Turkish child recognizes his ancestor, he will find strength to do greater work.

I address the youth of the Republic of Turkey, especially today's youth and their growing children: The West was more back from you and the Turks. In the sense, in the idea, this was the case in history. If the West shows a superiority in the Western technique, O Turkish child, that misdemeanor is not yours, but a result of the unforgivable negligence of those before you. Let me also say that, you're so clever! .. This is certain. But forget your intelligence! .. always be hardworking ...
Nations are alone and only teachers. A nation deprived of the teacher and the educator has not yet gained the ability to take the name of a nation.
The people of Turkey who founded the Republic of Turkey is called the Turkish nation ...
Those who establish the Republic should also be able to protect it.
We have written as we have experienced history, but it is necessary to entrust the future to those who believe in the Republic, those who protect it and those who will keep it alive.
What is important is the silence of the facade inside, which is destroyed by the basis of the country.
My duties of my Turkish nation, the Turkish community, the future of Turkishness are not finished, you will complete them. Repeat my promise to the next ones.
Independence, future, freedom, justice lieu of everything!

Nations should not believe and trust even in the assemblies to be left, even if their sovereignty is temporary. Because even the assemblies can make despotism and this despotism can be more dangerous than individual despotism. The assemblies may have such decisions that these decisions may cause impossible damage to the nation's life.

Young people are the ones who reinforce and maintain our courage. You will be the most valuable episode of humanity and civilization, love of homeland, freedom of ideas with the manners and wisdom you are taking. The new generation of rising, you are the future. We builded the republic, you are the ones who raise it and keep it alive.
Teachers! The Republic requires intellectual, ilmen, fennen, physically strong and high -character guards. It is in your hands to raise the new generation with this feature and ability.
The teacher receives his award after years.
The teacher looks like a lamp, giving light to others by consuming himself.
The homeland is in question, the rest is details.
Those who set out not to rest will never get tired.
The aim of the revolutions we do and we are doing is to change the people of the Republic of Turkey into a civilized society with all its meaning and form.

The whole world knows that there is a support for me: the support of the Republic, the support of intellectual and social revolution. At this point, I do not want to think of a individual in the new Turkish community.

War must be essential and vital. The life of the nation is a murder unless the life of the nation is in danger. Growth youth. Give them the positive ideas of knowledge and wisdom. You will meet the light of the future.
Full independence is only possible with financial independence. When the financial of a state lacks independence, independence is paralyzed in all the lights of the state.

Religion is a matter of conscience. Everyone is free to obey the orders of conscience. We respect religion. Thought and thinking are not dissidents. We only try not to confuse religious affairs with nation and state affairs, and avoid taassup actions based on muscle and verb.
After the military victories we have gained with bayonets, weapons and blood, we will continue to win victories in the fields of culture, science, science and economics.
Victory is the one who can say, "Victory is mine." Success, "I will succeed," starting starting "I have succeeded" can say.
Sovereignty is not given, it is taken.

The Turkish Nation is the grandchildren of the brave people who lived independently and accept independence as the sole condition of their existence. This nation has never lived without free, can not live and will not live.
Our nation has been successful because it showed an unshakable integrity in her behavior and efforts.
No matter how rich and prosperous, a nation deprived of independence cannot be considered worthy of a higher treatment from the position of being a servant in the face of civilized humanity.
National sovereignty is such a light that chains melt, crowns and throne sink, ruined. The institutions founded on the prisoner of the nations are doomed to be destroyed everywhere.
I could teach this nation a lot, but I could not teach them to be a servant.
National struggles were not personal ambition, but national ideal, national honor.

The character of the Turkish nation is high. The Turkish nation is hardworking. The Turkish Nation is smart ... The Turkish nation has known how to defeat the difficulties in national unity and solidarityâ€¦ The historical quality of the Turkish nation is to love fine arts and to rise in it. The Turkish nation is the great nation, the whole civilized realm will recognize once again, once again ...
The forgotten great civil character and the great civilization of Turkishness will rise like a new sun on the high horizon horizon of the future with its subsequent development.
The dignity, dignity and ability of the Turks are very high and large.

The Turkish nation loves and appreciates everything beautiful, every civilized thing, every high thing. But it is certainly that if there is something that he appreciates on everything, he is heroism.
Our nation is a devoted people for his homeland, freedom and sovereignty.
Turkish is a nation that does not accept captivity.
We have no shortage of other nations. We are brave, smart, hardworking, we know how to die for high purposes.
The great nations do great things.

He is the real owner of the political and social revolutions made by the Turkish nation in recent years. Without this ability and evolution in our nation, no force and power would have been enough to create it.
I wouldn't have done anything if this nation was not willing to give her life for the sake of the cause.
In the big works we have attempted, the high ability and high common sense of our nation have been our main guide and success source.
There is no difficulty in which Turkish strength and intelligence are not eaten and cannot be eaten.
My only honorary in life is nothing but my wealth.

When necessary, a nation who knows how to work with a single individual for the homeland with a single individual and decided to work with a great future is a nation that is worthy of a great and candidate.

There are two Mustafa Kemal: one of me, meat and bone, temporary Mustafa Kemal ... I can not express it with the word "I"; It is not me, it is us! He is a enlightened and warrior community in every corner of the country, engaged in new ideas, new life and great ideal. I'm representing their dreams. My attempts are for satisfaction with what they miss. He is Mustafa Kemal, you are all of you. It is Mustafa Kemal, who is not temporary, who should be able to live and succeed!

The success of a nation is absolutely possible with the formation of all national forces in a direction. Therefore, let us know that the success we have achieved came from the unity of the nation and the common movement. If we want to repeat the same success and victories in the future, let's stand the same basis and walk in the same way.

Teachers; You will raise the new generation of the devoted teachers and educators of the Republic. And the new generation will be your masterpiece. The value of the work will be proportional to the degree of your skill and sacrifice. Republic; Fikren, ilmen, fennen, physically strong and high -character protectors require. It is in your hands to raise the new generation, this feature and ability ... Your success will be the success of the Republic.
Seeing me does not necessarily mean to see my face. If you understand my ideas and my feelings thats enough.
Education, culture and knowledge is the largest window to light.
My humble body will of course one day the earth, but the Republic of Turkey will remain forever.
The Republic is a supporter of the freedom of ideas. We respect every idea provided that it is sincere and legitimate.
National sovereignty is such a light that chains melt, crowns and throne sink, ruined. The institutions founded on the prisoner of the nations are doomed to be destroyed everywhere.
I want to put forward the rules of Turkish language with science methods and those who write in every branch use our beautiful, harmonious language that the majority can understand with all terms.
The school teaches young brains respect for humanity, love to the nation and the country, the honor of independence.
Thanks to the school, thanks to the science and science given by the school, the Turkish nation, Turkish art, Turkish economics, Turkish poetry and literature develop with all its beauties.

It is a clear wish of our main politics to raise a virtuous, mighty generation that is based on the foundations of positive sciences, who loves fine arts, has increased the ability and risen in body manners as well as in mind manners.
Let us know that nations that do not know their national self are feeding to other nations.
Friends! Our revolution has undertaken the happiness of Turkey for centuries. It is our duty to work by understanding and appreciation.

What is unfortunate those who do not want to adapt their steps to the civilization and innovation steps we have taken! If such people still hope that they will deceive the nation, these hopes can already be sure that they will not give any other results than their harm.

When we say ignorant, we do not mean those who have not read in the school. The science we mean is to know the truth. Otherwise, the greatest ignorant of those who have read, as well as those who do not read at all, may see true scholars who see the truth.
We Turks, throughout our history, we are a nation that has become a symbolic with freedom and independence.
No matter how rich and prosperous, a nation deprived of independence cannot be considered worthy of a higher treatment from the position of being a servant in the face of civilized humanity.
Peace at home peace in the world.
The Turkish nation's request and the decision is to progress tirelessly on the way to civilization.
The most appropriate administration is the administration of the Republic.
The new generation will take the largest Republicanism lesson from today's community of teachers and their teachers.
National struggles were not personal ambition, but national ideal, national honor.
Unless a nation has an educational army, no matter how brilliant victories it obtains on the battlefields, it is only possible for those victories to give permanent results.
In order for a religion to be natural, it should be appropriate for reason, science, knowledge and logic.

It has the right and freedom to think that every individual wants, to believe what he wants, to have a political idea of his own, to make or not to make the requirements of a religion he has chosen. No one's opinions and consciences can not be the judge.
The Turkish nation's request and the final decision is to progress without stopping, non -stop.
People who are not civilized are doomed to stay under the feet of civilized ones.
Friends, masters and O nation, know well that the Republic of Turkey Sheikhs, Dervishes, MÃ¼ritler, Meczuplar can not be the country. The most accurate, most genuine cult, cult of civilization.
It is enough to be human to do what civilization ordered.
We are all in the family of world civilization. We'll apply all the necessities of civilization.
Teachers from all over the world are the most devoted and reverend elements of the human community.

The principles that we follow in the state administration should never keep one with the dogmas of the books that are thought to descend from the sky. We have taken our inspirations directly from the sky and not from life, but from life.

In the face of every difficulty and difficulty, our nation is constantly progressing and rising. Trying to increase the speed of the great Turkish nation in this road through every means is our most happy duty of all of us.
O hero Turkish woman, you are worthy of rising to the skies on the shoulders, not to crawl on the ground.

The real struggle for our women is to adorn and navy with light, knowledge and culture, with real virtue, rather than success in the field, form and disguise that needs to be victory. I am one of those who never doubt that our Reverend ladies will not be below European women, but in many ways to be equipped with light, knowledge and culture, and certainly sure.
I will give my life to the Turkish nation, including my greatest gift when it is necessary.
Working means not getting tired in vain, sweating. According to the requirements of the time, it is mandatory to benefit from science and technique and all kinds of civilized inventions.
No victory is a purpose. Victory is only a major means to achieve a greater purpose than him.
Victory refers to value (value) in proportion to the service of an idea. A victory that is not based on the employment of an idea cannot be pÃ¢yidar. It is an empty effort.
A new world (world) should be born after every great square battle and every great victory. Otherwise, a victory in itself would be wasted an effort.

Turkey's main owner and master is the real producer peasant. So, he is more than anyone else, and he is the peasant who is worthy of prosperity, happiness and reserve. For this reason, the economic policy of the Turkish Grand National Assembly is aiming to achieve this original purpose.
The press is the joint voice of the nation. A force in itself, a school is a pioneer.
Economic development is the backbone of Turkey's free, detached, always stronger, always more prosperous Turkey ideal.
Full independence is only possible with economic independence.
In a country lacking freedom are death and collapse. The mother of every progress and salvation is freedom.
We are not the enemy of anyone. We are the enemy of those who are the enemies of humanity alone.
History can never deny the blood and existence of a nation.
The existence of a nation that is not independent of justice in the form of a state cannot be accepted.
There is no mastery for the nation. There is service. The one who serve this country, become its master.
When we say we want peace, everyone should understand that we call full independence.
One of the nation's lifeblood artless rest is cut off.
Consumer is not good to live. Let's be a manufacturer.
No matter how big they are political, military victories, the victories that occurred cannot be continuous, if they are not crowned with economic victories, they will go out in a short time.
The country will surely be modern civilized and new. This is a life case for us.

The new state of Turkey will establish the foundations of the state with the economy on which the bayonet is based. The new state of Turkey will not be a state of Cihangir. But the new state of Turkey will be an economic state.
A nation that does not paint, a nation that does not make a sculpture, a nation does not do the things required by the technique, it should admit that the nation has no place to progress.

The law of revolution is above the laws at hand. Unless we kill us, the revolution and innovation we have started will not stop for a moment unless we suffocate the current in our heads. This will be the case in the following periods.
Great achievements occur with the help of elite children raised by valuable mothers.
The reason for the failure in the society arises from the neglect and flaw we show against our women.
For everything in the world, for civilization, for life, for success, the most genuine master is science, it is a fev.
Remember that; The greatest war is the war against ignorance and reaction.
